title: Samsung Galaxy S6 and LG G4 release dates delayed, reports say | Trusted Reviews
description: ![]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 810 is an octa-core processor that makes use of 4 quad-core A57s and 4 quad-core A53s.The chip is 64-bit friendly, and promises to fully support a 4K ultra-HDdisplay – tempting accolades for smartphone makers.Samsung is in a fortunate position in that it has its own range of chips – theExynos series – that could just as well be plugged into an upcomingsmartphone, but Sony isn’t so fortunate.LG does have its own application processor – NUCLUN – but [it doesn’t seemboast the performance required](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/lg-confirms-own-nuclun-cpu-and-first-phone-to-be-powered-by-it) to power aflagship device to a Snapdragon standard.**Read More:** [iPad Pro: When will we actually seeit?](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/ipad-pro-12-9-release-date-concepts-stylus-specs-and-rumours)
